metadata.synopsis: Kivak is excited to meet the player, in a dorky kind of way. This dialogue is available during a celebration back at camp once the goblins are defeated.

0.speaker: Kivak
0.text: Your courage is an inspiration to us all!
0.context: NodeContext: In awe/nervously. Not formal. He's *slightly* tipsy.

1.speaker: Kivak
1.text: You - you're the one who saved us. It's an honour!
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Does a little half-bow.NodeContext: In awe/nervously. Not formal. He's *slightly* tipsy.
